org.apache.webdav.lib.methods
Class LabelMethod

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpMethodBase
        |
        +--org.apache.webdav.lib.methods.XMLResponseMethodBase
              |
              +--org.apache.webdav.lib.methods.LabelMethod
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpMethod
public class LabelMethod
extends XMLResponseMethodBase

The Label method is used to manipulate labels on resources on the server.

Example Request

 LABEL /files/testfile.xml HTTP/1.1
 Host: www.webdav.org
 Content-Type: text/xml; charset="utf-8"

 
 
   
     newlabel

Example Response

 HTTP/1.1 200 OK
 Cache-Control: no-cache

Author:
Michael Smith
